name: histophysiology
content:
Add to word list

the scientific study of the tissue of living things: histophysiology of On a molecular level, the histophysiology of fibrocartilage is a complex, intricate system. Her research looks at the histology and histophysiology of the alveolar lung tissue.
More examplesFewer examplesWe studied the histophysiology of the thyroid gland during administration of mercazolyl.The review analyzes the main scientific evidence on the effects of SARS-CoV-2 on the histophysiology of the male reproductive system.Recent advances in the histophysiology of the normal thymus have revealed its complex architecture.
